GenAiFunction.description: - Use this action to get important user specific information like User Id, Name, Timezone or Org-specific data as Org id and Base URL of the Org - User and Time specific informations are needed to e.g. create query filtered by the user or that a relative to time information like "last week" "my accounts". - The Org Base URL is needed whenever you construct Links to records or pages in the Org.
